Windows

System Requirements

Runs on Windows 7 and later

Requires .NET Framework 4.8. This is bundled with newer versions of Windows, but on older versions, you might have to grab it here

Other Platforms

Sorry, FRESHMusicPlayer isn't available for other platforms yet :(

Cross platform support is planned for the next major release!
